pullrequest.title: Start of command line tool for parsing log files.

content.raw:
This is the first time I've tried to test data logging, but when I try to log data with `gzserver -r` or `gzserver -r empty.world`, I get a gzerr:
~~~
Error [Param.hh:214] Empty string used when setting a required parameter. Key[world_name]
~~~
Is that normal? I'm trying to generate a log so I can test the gzlog tool. For now, I'll just use the logs you've put in the tools/test/data folder.
content.html:
This is the first time I've tried to test data logging, but when I try to log data with gzserver -r or gzserver -r empty.world, I get a gzerr:

Error [Param.hh:214] Empty string used when setting a required parameter. Key[world_name]

Is that normal? I'm trying to generate a log so I can test the gzlog tool. For now, I'll just use the logs you've put in the tools/test/data folder.
